faqs.question: What are the university office hours?
faqs.answer: Our office hours are Monday to Friday, 9 AM to 5 PM.

faqs.question: Where is the library located?
faqs.answer: The main library is located in Building A, near the student center.

faqs.question: How do I apply for admission?
faqs.answer: You can apply online through our university admissions portal.

faqs.question: What is the last date to apply for admission?
faqs.answer: The admission deadline for the fall semester is August 15th.

faqs.question: How can I check my exam schedule?
faqs.answer: Exam schedules are posted on the student portal one month before exams.

faqs.question: What courses are offered in the Computer Science department?
faqs.answer: We offer courses such as Algorithms, Data Structures, AI, Machine Learning, and more.

faqs.question: How do I get my student ID card?
faqs.answer: Visit the student services office with your admission letter to get your ID card.

faqs.question: What scholarships are available?
faqs.answer: We offer merit-based, need-based, and sports scholarships. Visit the scholarships page for details.

faqs.question: Can I change my course after enrollment?
faqs.answer: Course changes are allowed within the first two weeks of the semester with advisor approval.

faqs.question: Where can I find the academic calendar?
faqs.answer: The academic calendar is available on the university website under ‘Academics’.

faqs.question: What are the tuition fees for undergraduate courses?
faqs.answer: Tuition fees vary by program. Please check the fees section on the university website.

faqs.question: Is there on-campus accommodation available?
faqs.answer: Yes, we have dormitories and hostels for students on campus.

faqs.question: How can I contact the registrar’s office?
faqs.answer: You can email registrar@university.edu or call (123) 456-7890.

faqs.question: Where is the cafeteria located?
faqs.answer: The cafeteria is in Building C next to the main auditorium.

faqs.question: Are there any student clubs I can join?
faqs.answer: Yes, we have many clubs including drama, debate, robotics, and sports teams.

faqs.question: How do I reset my student portal password?
faqs.answer: Use the ‘Forgot Password’ link on the student portal login page.

faqs.question: What is the procedure for applying for leave?
faqs.answer: Submit a leave application form to your department head for approval.

faqs.question: Can international students apply for scholarships?
faqs.answer: Yes, many scholarships are open to international students.

faqs.question: What is the process for registering for courses?
faqs.answer: Register for courses via the student portal during the registration period.

faqs.question: Are online courses available?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer several online and hybrid courses.

faqs.question: How do I get a transcript?
faqs.answer: Request transcripts through the registrar’s office website or in person.

faqs.question: Where can I park my vehicle on campus?
faqs.answer: Student parking is available in Lot B and Lot D with a valid parking permit.

faqs.question: Is there a health center on campus?
faqs.answer: Yes, the campus health center is located in Building F.

faqs.question: What sports facilities are available?
faqs.answer: We have a gymnasium, football field, tennis courts, and swimming pool.

faqs.question: How do I apply for a study abroad program?
faqs.answer: Contact the international office or visit their website for application details.

faqs.question: What documents are needed for admission?
faqs.answer: You need transcripts, ID proof, passport photos, and any test scores.

faqs.question: How can I contact my academic advisor?
faqs.answer: Advisor contact info is listed in your student portal.

faqs.question: Are there any upcoming university events?
faqs.answer: Upcoming events are posted on the university calendar online.

faqs.question: What is the policy on late assignment submission?
faqs.answer: Late submissions may incur penalties unless prior permission is granted.

faqs.question: How do I join the university mailing list?
faqs.answer: Subscribe via the website or contact the communications office.

faqs.question: What computer labs are available for students?
faqs.answer: Computer labs are located in Buildings B and D, open 8 AM to 10 PM.

faqs.question: Is Wi-Fi available on campus?
faqs.answer: Yes, free Wi-Fi is available across all campus buildings.

faqs.question: How do I get help with career counseling?
faqs.answer: Visit the career services office or book an appointment online.

faqs.question: Are there part-time job opportunities on campus?
faqs.answer: Yes, the student employment office lists available positions.

faqs.question: What is the grading system used?
faqs.answer: We use letter grades A, B, C, D, and F with corresponding GPA values.

faqs.question: Can I take a gap semester?
faqs.answer: Yes, students can apply for a leave of absence with approval.

faqs.question: How do I update my personal details?
faqs.answer: Update your details in the student portal or contact student services.

faqs.question: Where can I find internship opportunities?
faqs.answer: Check the career services website for internships and co-op listings.

faqs.question: What library resources are available online?
faqs.answer: Access ebooks, journals, and research databases via the library website.

faqs.question: How do I apply for a scholarship?
faqs.answer: Complete the scholarship application form available online during the application period.

faqs.question: What should I do if I lose my student ID?
faqs.answer: Report to student services to request a replacement ID card.

faqs.question: What dining options are available on campus?
faqs.answer: We have cafeterias, coffee shops, and food trucks across campus.

faqs.question: Are there counseling services available?
faqs.answer: Yes, confidential counseling services are offered at the student health center.

faqs.question: How do I register for exams?
faqs.answer: Exam registration is done online via the student portal before deadlines.

faqs.question: Where can I find the university's code of conduct?
faqs.answer: The code of conduct is available on the university website under ‘Policies’.

faqs.question: Can I audit a course without earning credits?
faqs.answer: Yes, auditing is allowed with permission from the course instructor.

faqs.question: How do I appeal a grade?
faqs.answer: Submit a grade appeal form to the academic affairs office within two weeks of results.

faqs.question: What transportation options are there to campus?
faqs.answer: The university is accessible by bus, shuttle service, and bicycle paths.

faqs.question: How do I get technical support?
faqs.answer: Contact the IT helpdesk via phone, email, or at the support center.
